restructured_question: If MTART IN ('ROH', 'FERT', 'HALB'), then check MATKL. If MATKL in MARA is in ('1000','2000','YBMM01') then hard code as 'mat0123' else check MATKL in MARA_700 and if found in ('L001','YBMM01') then hardcode as 'MAT1923'. ELSE DEFAULT TO 'NONE0912'

transformation_history.description: If MTART IN ('ROH', 'FERT', 'HALB'), then check MATKL. If MATKL in MARA is in ('1000','2000','YBMM01') then hard code as 'mat0123' else check MATKL in MARA_700 and if found in ('L001','YBMM01') then hardcode as 'MAT1923'. ELSE DEFAULT TO 'NONE0912'
